duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical expertise for offshore substation facilities, auxiliary, and LV systems, and prepare related technical documentation.
Manage and lead technical and mechanical works on project construction sites.
Supervise the application and development of relevant internal standards, regulations, and norms.
Collaborate with package teams and provide support for the development of electrical systems including offshore and onshore substations, cables, and foundations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
